attributes.action: stop paying all benefits including housing benefit for non-british nationals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am fed up with influx of foreign people coming into this country purely just to claim benefits for themselves and their families and have no intention of working at all. it is a burden on the hard working people of this country and must stop.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
